name: Anxiety (itch) (jaraujo)
description:
Description

Don’t let yourself be overwhelmed by one of the most common mental illness of our age: Anxiety 
Avoid getting items that makes you anxious, the more you have, the faster you get and trust me: That’s no good!

Controls

You jump and double jump pressing SPACE

And you restart the level pressing R (Unfortunately, you’ll may have to press it a lot, bc of bugs )

Commentaries

So… Two hours before the deadline, I finally finished my first LD game! I gotta say, it was tiring and fun, and even that I couldn’t do everything I wanted because the lack of time, I guess it was a good learning experience 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/40/anxiety
